attributes.action: ensure that all future coal power stations are clean coal and a replacement of existing coal power plants with zero carbon emission clean coal power plants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The technology for almost zero carbon emission clean coal technology already exists. We wish that all future coal power plants are at least this standard whilst existing coal plant are upgraded to this carbon emission standard. This would ensure energy security.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
